result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Randy James Promer

records.addlTxt:
TO ALSO INCLUDE 13CF373, 13CM314 and 14CF72
CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Liddle,ADA:  Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Owen R. Williams   DF:  Randy James Promer appeared. Case called at 9:28 a.m. Atty Williams states no contest to 13CF373 without repeater, 14CF72 and 13CM314 moves to dismiss per agreement with state. ADA Correll makes statement that 14CF72 and 13CM314 will be read in and dismissed for sentencing purposes. Not aware of any restitution.   Court reviews constitutional rights with def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights.  13CF373 Court reads charge and possible penalties for count one Possess Amphetamine, def pleads NO CONTEST. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates def guilty of count 1 Possess Amphetamine without repeater. Court accepts plea of no contest to amended charge without the repeater and finds guilty to count 1 13CF373. Order PSI on 13CF373.  13CM314 dismissed without prejudice and read in for sentencing purposes. 14CF72 dismissed with prejudice and read in for sentencing purposes. Bond continues.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for February 3, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on December 1, 2014 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Randy James Promer
Current: 1824 E Madison Street, Eau Claire, WI 54701 United States  (Effective: 04-01-2014)
Prior: 730 Cedar Street, #8, Baldwin, WI 54002

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Renee P.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
